note.p: German-born chemical merchant. Naturalised British subject, 1892. Member of several civic and scientific societies in Glasgow, including the Royal Scottish Geographical Society. Honorary LLD, Glasgow University, 1901.
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 23 April 2020)
Germany, Lutheran baptisms, marriages, and burials, 1500–1971 (Ancestry.com, accessed 23 April 2020)
UK, naturalisation certificates and declarations, 1870–1916 (Ancestry.com, accessed 23 April 2020)
